verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rejoice, believer, in the Lord, who makes your cause His own; the hope that's built upon His Word can ne'er be overthrown.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Though many foes beset your road, and feeble is your arm, your life is hid with Christ in God beyond the reach of harm.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Weak as you are, you shall not faint or fainting, shall not die! Jesus, the strength of ev'ry saint, will aid you from on high.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thou sometimes unperceived by sense, faith sees Him always near! a Guide, a Glory, a Defense; then what have you to fear?

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: As surely as He overcame and triumphed once for you, so surely you that love His name shall in Him triumph too.
